title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Skills: Social Inquiry Projects Applying Digital Bloom’s Taxonomy

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design social problem-solving projects by utilizing the six levels of digital Bloom’s taxonomy (remembering-understanding-applying-analyzing-evaluating-creating).
Learners can collect and reorganize learning materials aligned with each stage of the digital Bloom’s taxonomy using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can demonstrate higher-order thinking skills in the analysis-evaluation-creation stages through project outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
